snippet: Ivorian officials Tuesday said that they were baffled as to what set off the stampede, which occurred as revelers were leaving a sprawling downtown stadium.
abstract: At least 60 people are killed in Ivory Coast capital Abidjan when crowd leaving New Year's fireworks display panics and stampedes; officials are investigating cause of stampede.
lead_paragraph: Ivorian officials Tuesday said that they were baffled as to what set off the stampede, which occurred as revelers were leaving a sprawling downtown stadium.

headline.seo: Stampede at New Year’s Celebration Kills Dozens in Ivory Coast
headline.main: Stampede at New Year’s Celebration Kills Dozens in Ivory Coast
headline.print_headline: Stampede at New Year’s Celebration Kills Dozens in Ivory Coast
